DOC.brief_title: Short-term Existential Behavioural Therapy Informal Caregivers Palliative Patients : Randomised Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator develop pilot-tested short-term manualised individual psychotherapy , call Existential Behavioural Therapy ( EBT ) , reduce psychological distress informal caregiver palliative patient . The investigator propose conduct two-arm randomise control trial ( RCT ) test effectiveness EBT usual care reduction distress promotion quality life . Two one-to-one manualised psychotherapeutic session compare treatment-as-usual control group.Treatment-as-usual include two supportive session . The design unblinded RCT consist two condition ( EBT Treatment-as-usual ) , assessment pre- post-treatment follow-up four week six month . The trial take place Clinic Palliative Care , University Munich ( Klinik und Poliklinik für Palliativmedizin der LMU München ) .
DOC.criteria: ≥ 21 year age informal caregiver palliative patient last stage life bereavement ; fluent German language skill psychiatric condition schizophrenic disorder , psychotic disorder etc . ; pronounce cognitive impairment e.g . delirium , dementia
